Silva Network Image Code Source changes

0.3

  Features added

    - Added a lookup field for the link field so if it's an internal link
      the path syntax is correct.

    - Changed the rollover tooltips in for the lookup fields so users know
      they can drag and drop from another window. 

0.2

  Features added

    - Added a LookupWindowField Improvements launcher for linking the image.

    - Improved the rollover tooltips in the parameters form.

0.1

    - Initial public release.

0.1a

    - Initial development.
